author: Daemon Capital
title: Viff.Club: Slimey Emotional NFTs
description: NFTs are just random and dull files. But, what if NFTs could be slimes? Be alive, independent, autonomous, emotional, and have live goals?
solution: Viff - your crypto-friend. One and only. Stored on-chain with emotions, gadgets, goals, and look metadata. Simulated in an off-chain world.
experience: Founders experienced in game and blockchain development, vector graphics, world design, AI&ML, and relevant work and education experience.
